entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [MAUI] Can't clear RadioButton Selection #25780
  • Calendar selected in device settings not available in CultureInfo #25779
  • [iOS] Fix Issue22035 so that it's passing on both CV1 and CV2 sets of handlers #25778
  • [iOS] Fix Issue11896 so that it's passing on both CV1 and CV2 sets of handlers #25777
    .NET 9 Servicing
  • [iOS] Fix CarouselViewRemoveAt so that it's passing on both CV1 and CV2 sets of handlers #25776
    .NET 9 Servicing
  • [iOS] Fix CarouselViewLoopNoFreeze so that it's passing on both CV1 and CV2 sets of handlers #25775
    .NET 9 Servicing
  • [iOS] Fix HeaderFooterGridHorizontal so that it's passing on both CV1 and CV2 sets of handlers #25774
    .NET 9 Servicing
  • [iOS] Fix HeaderFooterGrid to pass on CV1 and CV2 #25773
    .NET 9 Servicing
  • Role "Button" is not announced by VoiceOver for every Span that has a GestureRecognizer #25764
    Backlog
  • Role "Button" not announced by TalkBack for Spans with GestureRecognizer #25763
    Backlog

Closed

  • What to do with all the things .NET 9 has now broken? Where is the official .NET 9 Maui code to compare with and find where things have moved? #25767
  • [Windows] TapGestureRecognizer not working on Entry #12213
    Backlog
  • [Windows] The screen does not display when changing the CurrentPage of a TabbedPage. #25518
    .NET 9 Servicing
  • Rendering problem when Image and Label are placed inside StackLayout #25769
    Backlog
  • [Windows, 9.0 Preview 7] Every quit and exit method throws an exception #24486
  • [9.0 RC2, Windows] Windows debugger crashes often with SkiaSharp 3.0 Preview 5.4, works with Preview 4.1 #25562
  • Add Maui 8.0.93 SR9.3 to list of Versions for github issues (etc) #25765
  • Android - NullReferenceException thrown from ItemContentView #23394
  • CollectionView Programmatic-Selection is not updated when binding the selectedItem #25551

PullRequests

Created

  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 5 #25772
    area-testing, community ✨
  • Fix Disabling some image tests after updating net9.0 with main #25770
    area-testing, community ✨
  • Fixed the hide password hint which is showing when the entry is focused #25768
    community ✨, area-controls-entry

Merged

  • Update sr1 with ga #25752
  • Fixed [Windows] TapGestureRecognizer not working on Entry #25311
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-controls-entry, area-gestures, .NET 9 SR2
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium #25711
    area-testing, community ✨, .NET 9 SR2
  • Setup lane to run CV2 and CV1 tests #25719
    area-testing
  • Re-Enable Template Tests #25674
    area-testing, .NET 9 SR2
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 2 #25731
    area-testing, community ✨
  • Update bug-report.yml #25771

Updated

  • Accessibility iOS - Editor - improvements #25702
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-editor, t/a11y
  • Character spacing in button - fix #25657
    community ✨, area-controls-button
  • CollectionView with EmptyView and EmptyViewTemplate for Data template selector throws an exception #25418
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, .NET 9 SR1.1
  • Fixed Editor HorizontalTextAlignment Does not Works. #25129
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-editor, .NET 9 Servicing
  • [UITesting, Catalyst] Fixed DragAndDropUITests to be more reliable #25146
    area-testing, community ✨
  • Fix [Android] Image AspectFill is not honored #25072
    platform/android 🤖, area-image, community ✨, .NET 9 Servicing
  • Fix for Frame PanGestureRecognizer is not working in Android #25239
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-gestures, .NET 9 Servicing
  • [Android] Tabs briefly display wrong background color when navigating between flyout items #24965
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • [Android] Ensure all controls in Layout with Search Bar are visible in Landscape Mode #24198
    community ✨, area-controls-entry, .NET 9 Servicing
  • [iOS] Improve background layer frame mapping performance #24848
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, t/perf, .NET 9 SR2
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 3 #25734
    area-testing, community ✨
  • Fix OnNavigatedTo not called when navigating back to a specific page #25552
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 4 #25751
    area-testing, community ✨
  • Fixed the Label height within VerticalStackLayout is truncated when width is set #25748
    area-layout, community ✨, area-controls-label
  • [Testing] UITest to measure layout passes on a common scenario #25671
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, area-testing, community ✨
  • [Testing] Implement ContextMenu UITest extension methods #25340
    area-testing
  • Better exception for using viewCell with collection View #25681
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
  • [Testing] Implement ScrollDownTo and ScrollUpTo methods in Appium #25601
    area-testing
  • [Testing] Enable snapshot tests on Catalyst #25710
    platform/macOS 🍏, area-testing
  • Toggling Header/Footer in CollectionView Dynamically throws an exception #25743
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • Fix for Tabs does not invoke its IQueryAttributable.ApplyQueryAttributes(query) #25663
    area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • [iOS] Fix for Editor scaling creating new lines on older iOS versions #25691
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-editor, .NET 9 SR2
  • Fixed Shell Navigating event issue when switching tabs #25749
    area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • Updating a Border.TranslationY does not work in Android - fix #25760
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-border
  • Fix Shell Flyout Menu Visibility Issue When Navigating Between TabBar and Flyout Items #25510
    area-navigation, area-controls-shell, community ✨, .NET 9 SR1.1
  • [iOS] Add size update for Shell Popup Overlay after rotation #15866
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • [Windows] Fix for wrong secondary ToolbarItem size #25550
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-controls-toolbar, .NET 9 SR2
